document.full_text: "the who" frontman roger daltrey is taking the british band's 1969 rock opera "tommy" on a six-week north american tour beginning in september, concert promoters said on thursday.
document.title: roger daltrey taking "tommy" on north american tour
lines_and_colors: "the who" frontman roger daltrey is taking the british band's 1969 rock opera "tommy" on a six-week north american tour beginning in september, concert promoters said on thursday.
